title: Ticket #1983: condor_test programs modify git tracked files
description:
Various tests/scripts in condor_tests, unknown exactly which ones at this time, modify git tracked files which are job submission files.

This produces a subset of files which are modified in a meaningless way and pollute the things one are changing. 

#   modified:   condor_tests/job_core_queue_sched.cmd
#   modified:   condor_tests/job_filexfer_base-input1_van.cmd
#   modified:   condor_tests/job_filexfer_base-input4_van.cmd
#   modified:   condor_tests/job_filexfer_limitback_van.cmd
#   modified:   condor_tests/job_filexfer_minus1_van.cmd
#   modified:   condor_tests/job_filexfer_output-withvacate_van.cmd
#   modified:   condor_tests/job_filexfer_output_van.cmd
#   modified:   condor_tests/job_filexfer_whento-base_van.cmd
#   modified:   condor_tests/job_filexfer_whento-simpleinput_van.cmd
#   modified:   condor_tests/job_filexfer_whento-withinput_van.cmd

It is annoying.
creator: psilord
